title: Love by Chance, Again
logline: When his vanished first love reappears, a man on the brink of commitment is torn between memory and loyalty in a tender drama of love lost and love chosen.

title: Exposure
logline: A photographer haunted by a mysterious figure in her images must face a deadly demon in a battle between worlds before it consumes her life and those she loves.

title: Napoleon's Table
logline: A meticulous history professor channels his obsession with Napoleon into a chilling dinner party, where secrets are weapons, and trust is a deadly gamble.

title: Outsiders
logline: A perfect weekend becomes a nightmare as a couple departs onto a journey to the remote forest in England.

title: Man of the Cosmos
logline: An enigmatic celestial being must decide the fate of humanity after centuries of observation, exploring the triumphs, tragedies, and contradictions that define the human race in a heart-wrenching battle between hope and destruction.

title: The Man
logline: The man who has nothing to lose anymore and sees no future ahead by chance meets a stranger that changes his mind.

title: Following
logline: When amateur photographer Anna decided to go for a walk and bring her camera along little did she know that her day would turn into a dark and twisted game.

title: Osaka
logline: A lonely Japanese girl living in London grapples with a profound sense of disconnection. She embarks on a journey of self-discovery determined to find her way out of the metaphorical maze.

title: Spooked
logline: When old friends and loved ones resurface just as a filmmaker is set to debut his film at a renowned European film festival, he must confront the true value of his past relationships and determine what he values most.

title: Love in the City
logline: Two polar opposites, brought together on a chaotic blind date in the heart of London, unexpectedly fall for each other despite their differences.

title: I See Darkness
logline: A former patient at a State Psychiatric Hospital Elyah fighting depression and nightmares which cause him to lose contact with the real world. He decides to confront his problems by performing a Ritual practiced by Ancient Mayans.

title: The Ritual
logline: Jack, a young actor facing a tough luck in his acting career decides to sell his soul to the devil in exchange for fame and success.

title: Honey and Wine
logline: Steve, who is stuck in a corporate loophole, while a business trip he meets Amanda, an escort worker that has more to her than just the look, the drive and the sexuality.

title: The Job
logline: When five robbers robbed a bank, they thought that the robbery itself was the hardest part of the job, but soon they came to realize that one of them decided to be smart and play a double game.

title: Despair
logline: After Jack and Lucy rescue a woman from freezing cold in the Scottish mountains, they gradually realise that she is not who she says she is and her intentions are unclear.
